lines.text: There will always be wars as long as men are such fools as to want to go to them.
She didn't pass on, pass over, or pass out! She died!

[putting down the newspaper]
Well, they're cutting down the navy, and they're cutting down the army. The only thing they don't seem to be cutting down is the unemployed!
You can't expect everyone else in the world to think like you do

[at the Wembley exhibition]
I brought them here to see the glories of Empire, and all they think about is going on the dodgems...
After four long years of war, the men are coming home.
